channel.title: Abouts on Phone Prove
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Phone Prove

item.title: About Phone Prove
item.description: This is a creative outlet for my photography and videos.- I love to take pictures, shoot videos and play with them but realized I needed an outlet so I created this concept.- The idea of Phone Prove is to try and see what can be achieved using only phone cameras.- I took the challenge after seeing several YouTube videos talking about how the photographer is a lot more important than the equipment and I wanted to experiment.
